overview: Premier fashion design house in Amman, Jordan, specializing in bespoke bridal gowns, elegant evening wear, and refined traditional and modern Jordanian formal attire since 1991.

services.name: Bridal Gown Design
services.description: Fully bespoke wedding dresses combining tradition and modern elegance, tailored to your vision and measurements.

services.name: Evening Wear Creation
services.description: Luxurious, custom-fitted evening gowns for galas and celebrations.

services.name: Traditional Jordanian Formal Wear
services.description: Traditional and contemporary Jordanian designs for formal events.

services.name: Custom Tailoring & Alterations
services.description: Professional fitting, garment construction, and alterations for all formal wear.

faqs.q: How do I schedule a consultation?
faqs.a: You can schedule a consultation by calling +962795166382 or visiting our studio at Fahd Center, 2nd Floor, Sweifieh, Amman, Jordan.
We are open Monday to Saturday from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM.
Yes, we offer personalized fashion consultations to help bring your vision to life. Our experienced designers will work with you to create the perfect design that matches your style and preferences.

contact.address: Fahed Center, 2nd Floor, Sweifieh, Amman, Jordan
